mapper.select: SELECT c.complaint_no AS complaintNo, c.title, c.content, c.category, c.status, c.created_date AS createdDate, c.address, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.image_path AS imagePath, c.answer, c.is_public AS isPublic, c.like_count AS likeCount, MAX(ca.agency_no) AS agencyNo, MAX(a.agency_name) AS agencyName, MAX(a.region_code) AS regionCode, MAX(CASE WHEN a.agency_type = 'LOCAL' THEN a.agency_name ELSE NULL END) AS regionName, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN CONCAT(MIN(a2.agency_name), ' 외 ', COUNT(*) - 1, '곳') WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN MIN(a2.agency_name) ELSE NULL END FROM agency a2 JOIN complaint_agency ca2 ON ca2.agency_no = a2.agency_no WHERE ca2.complaint_no = c.complaint_no ) AS assignedAgencyText FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN complaint_agency ca ON c.complaint_no = ca.complaint_no LEFT JOIN agency a ON ca.agency_no = a.agency_no WHERE c.complaint_no = #{complaintNo} GROUP BY c.complaint_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spatial_feature ( feature_type, geom, addr_text, complaint_no, created_at ) VALUES ( #{featureType}, ST_GeomFromText(#{geom, typeHandler=com.safeguard.config.GeometryTypeHandler}, 4326), #{addrText}, #{complaintNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

where.if: AND (c.title ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR c.content ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT c.complaint_no AS complaintNo, c.title, c.category, c.status, c.created_date AS createdDate, c.address, c.is_public AS isPublic, c.like_count AS likeCount, MAX(ca.agency_no) AS agencyNo, MAX(a.agency_name) AS agencyName, MAX(a.region_code) AS regionCode, MAX(CASE WHEN a.agency_type = 'LOCAL' THEN a.agency_name ELSE NULL END) AS regionName FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN complaint_agency ca ON c.complaint_no = ca.complaint_no LEFT JOIN agency a ON ca.agency_no = a.agency_no
GROUP BY c.complaint_no ORDER BY
c.created_date c.like_count c.complaint_no
ASC DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.complaint_no) FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN complaint_agency ca ON c.complaint_no = ca.complaint_no LEFT JOIN agency a ON ca.agency_no = a.agency_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO complaint_like (complaint_no, user_no) VALUES (#{complaintNo}, #{userNo}) ON CONFLICT (complaint_no, user_no) DO NOTHING
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM complaint_like WHERE complaint_no = #{complaintNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.complaint_no) AS total, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN CAST(c.created_date AS DATE) = CAST(NOW() AS DATE) THEN c.complaint_no END) AS today, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.status = 'UNPROCESSED' THEN c.complaint_no END) AS received, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.status = 'IN_PROGRESS' THEN c.complaint_no END) AS processing, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN c.complaint_no END) AS completed, COALESCE(ROUND( (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.status = 'COMPLETED' AND c.updated_date <= c.created_date + INTERVAL '3 days' THEN c.complaint_no END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN c.complaint_no END), 0)) * 100, 1 ), 0) AS sla_compliance FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN complaint_agency ca ON c.complaint_no = ca.complaint_no
AND ca.agency_no = #{agencyNo}
SELECT * FROM complaint WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT SPLIT_PART(address, ' ', 2) AS name, COUNT(CASE WHEN status IN ('UNPROCESSED', 'IN_PROGRESS') THEN 1 END)::int AS count FROM complaint WHERE address LIKE '서울특별시 %' GROUP BY SPLIT_PART(address, ' ', 2) ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT SPLIT_PART(address, ' ', 2) AS name, COUNT(*)::int AS count FROM complaint WHERE status IN ('UNPROCESSED', 'IN_PROGRESS') AND created_date < (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '3 days') AND address LIKE '서울특별시 %' GROUP BY SPLIT_PART(address, ' ', 2) ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, u.birth_date)) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, u.birth_date)) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, u.birth_date)) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, u.birth_date)) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, u.birth_date)) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대+' END AS agegroup, COUNT(*)::int AS count FROM complaint c JOIN app_user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.birth_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY agegroup ORDER BY agegroup

SELECT complaint_no AS id, category, title, SPLIT_PART(address, ' ', 2) AS district, '안전총괄실' AS agency, CONCAT( EXTRACT(DAY FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - created_date)), '일 ', EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - created_date)), '시간 지연' ) AS overdueTime FROM complaint WHERE status IN ('UNPROCESSED', 'IN_PROGRESS') AND created_date < (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '3 days') AND address LIKE '서울특별시 %' ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT 20
